description:
Whether you’re upgrading to deep-dish aero rims, or you new bike comes with them, and you’ve got a stash of tubes with shorth valve stems, these valve extensions will get you ready to roll.

  • Works with presta valves with removable cores
  • Valve core tool included
  • Rubber seal keeps the air where it should be
name: Continental Presta Valve Extenders (Pair)
